description.en:
Inspired by MakerDao, Compound, Synthetix and Ampleforth, this project aims to
peg an ERC20 token (sBTC) price to 0.0001 BTC or 100,000 Satoshi by utilizing the
built-in smart contract token contraction & expansion algorithm, variable staking
policies and sBTC Foundation reserves to ensure that one sBTC will be
mathematically guaranteed to be worth 0.0001 BTC in the short/medium term
regardless of circumstances.
